name: Fighting Fantasy: Talisman of Death
description:
Fighting Fantasy: Talisman of Death brings the original 16m selling series of Fantasy Role-Playing Gamebooks to the PlayStation®Network for the first time!

The once peaceful world or Orb is in terrible danger. Dark forces are at work to unleash the awesome might of the Evil One. Your mission is to destroy the Talisman of Death before the dark lord's minions reach you. But beware! Time is running out...

This PlayStation®Network-exclusive version of Fighting Fantasy: Talisman of Death also features a Tarot Card character generation system, and the classic dice-rolling rule set you know and love, with optional all-new Battle and Test Your Luck systems for bold adventurers to explore.

The intuitive Inventory system and an all-new Log Book help you easily track your progress through Orb's magical world, make this the perfect way to relive this classic series.

Go forth, brave adventurer!
